name: Fake Run
description:
How To Play

Use left or right arrow keys or W and D to move. Spacebar is to jump.

You must make it to the end of the level, some of the platforms are trick platforms and will cause you to fall.

This is my first game and there will be some bugs. So keep that in mind.

Please give me feedback in the comments

If you are going to play the web build, please make sure to be on fullscreen.
